comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111005 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111005030932

Steps to reproduce:

I wanted to login in some pages by using the first letters of my loginname, then using the down-button for the first available screened loginname. 


Actual results:

The selection doesn´t choose the first name as always, it chooses the last name. After that i mentioned that the same problem is in the linkselection, too.


Expected results:

Normally i can choose a link or a loginname with the up- and down-button, but now i can´t go down or up with these buttons. Selection with a mouseclick is still available.

comments.text: Not security sensitive. Not sure if this is a dupe of bug 690668 or not, but if it is it will be fixed in tomorrow's Nightly build.
